statements: SELECT * FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices;
SELECT crop_name, farming_method FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices;
SELECT id, crop_rotation_period FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices;
SELECT * FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name AS CropName, farming_method AS FarmingMethod FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices;
SELECT * FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat';
SELECT id, crop_name FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE crop_rotation_period > 3 AND farming_method = 'Organic';
SELECT crop_name, farming_method FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE crop_rotation_period <= 2 ORDER BY farming_method DESC;
SELECT id, crop_rotation_period FROM SustainableAgriculturePractices WHERE farming_method = 'No-till' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_cycle FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_cycle > 2;
SELECT farm_name, certification_status FROM OrganicFarming WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM OrganicFarming ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT rotation_cycle, last_rotated_date FROM CropRotation WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_cycle > 3 ORDER BY last_rotated_date DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_cycle FROM CropRotation WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat' OR crop_name = 'Rice' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_cycle, last_rotated_date FROM CropRotation WHERE last_rotated_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_rotated_date DESC;
SELECT farm_name, certification_status, certification_agency FROM OrganicFarming WHERE certification_status = true ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT farm_name, certification_agency, certification_date FROM OrganicFarming WHERE certification_agency = 'USDA' ORDER BY certification_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation;
SELECT id, crop_name, rotation_years FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_years > 2;
SELECT method_name, description FROM OrganicFarmingMethods WHERE certification_status = 'certified';
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM FarmFields ORDER BY field_area DESC;
SELECT method_name, description FROM OrganicFarmingMethods WHERE id IN (SELECT method_id FROM FarmFields WHERE field_area > 100);
SELECT * FROM CropRotation;
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM FarmFields WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, description FROM OrganicFarmingMethods WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT id, crop_name, rotation_years, last_rotation_date FROM CropRotation ORDER BY rotation_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmFields INNER JOIN OrganicFarmingMethods ON FarmFields.method_id = OrganicFarmingMethods.id;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_period FROM CropRotation ORDER BY rotation_period DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM CropRotation;
SELECT * FROM OrganicFarming WHERE organic_certified = true;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM CropHarvest ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_period > 3;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_period FROM CropRotation WHERE last_rotated_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM FarmEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tractor' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrganicFarming WHERE organic_certified = TRUE AND certification_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date, quantity FROM CropHarvest ORDER BY quantity DESC, harvest_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM farm_practices;
SELECT farm_name, size_acres FROM farm ORDER BY size_acres DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM farming_methods WHERE id = 2;
SELECT name, location FROM farmer WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, rotation_sequence FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_sequence ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_sequence > 3;
SELECT farm_name, size_acres FROM farm ORDER BY size_acres DESC;

SELECT farmer.name, farm.farm_name, crop_rotation.crop_name FROM farmer JOIN farm ON farmer.id = farm.id JOIN farm_practices ON farm.id = farm_practices.farm_id JOIN crop_rotation ON farm_practices.crop_rotation_id = crop_rotation.id;
SELECT DISTINCT method_name FROM farming_methods;
SELECT farm_name, method_name, method_description FROM farm JOIN farm_practices ON farm.id = farm_practices.farm_id JOIN farming_methods ON farm_practices.farming_method_id = farming_methods.id;
